attributes.action: Force football clubs to protect wages of non playing employees paid under £30kpa
attributes.background: As another example of a football club goes into administration today the football league should enforce clubs to pay into a separate account to protect the wages of the non playing staff who do not benefit from the super high salaries that the players enjoy.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling for the football league to take action and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking the Government to guarantee to protect wages of all staff earning under £30k when a business goes into administration, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
